text: Honey Dew Donuts is a privately owned and operated Massachusetts-based coffeehouse chain. It sells donuts, coffee and other breakfast foods in New England. Honey Dew Donuts opened its first restaurant in Mansfield, Massachusetts. Its headquarters are in Plainville, Massachusetts. As of August 20, 2021, there were 125 locations in all 6 states of New England. ==References== Category:Companies based in Massachusetts
title: Honey Dew Donuts
